QuestData.Title: Ingvar Must Die!
QuestData.Description: Of our entire recon party, only I remain.$b$bThese vrykul are relentless fighters. Given their numbers and their savage tactics, our only hope is to bring down their leader and pray it brings chaos to their ranks.$b$bIngvar is his name. Bring me his head!
QuestData.LogDescription: Dark Ranger Marrah has asked you to kill Ingvar the Plunderer inside Utgarde Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: This is just the tip of the iceberg, so to speak.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. With their leader removed, our efforts against these vrykul should be more successful.$b$bService such as this cannot go unrewarded!
